data.chText: 猛扔；猛投；猛摔
data.enText: to throw sth/sb violently in a particular direction

data.chText: 他往窗户里扔了块砖。
data.enText: He hurled a brick through the window.

data.chText: 大声说出（辱骂或斥责等）
data.enText: to shout insults, etc. at sb

data.chText: 两帮对立的球迷相互高声辱骂。
data.enText: Rival fans hurled abuse at each other.

data.chText: 呕吐
data.enText: to vomit

data.text: throw ♦ toss ♦ hurl ♦ fling ♦ chuck ♦ lob ♦ bowl ♦ pitch

data.chText: 以上各词均含扔、投、掷、抛之义。
data.enText: All these words mean to send sth from your hand through the air.
throw

data.chText: 指投、掷、抛、扔：
data.enText: to send sth from your hand or hands through the air

data.chText: 有些孩子在朝窗户扔石头。
data.enText: Some kids were throwing stones at the window.

data.chText: 她把球抛出来，他接住了。
data.enText: She threw the ball and he caught it.
toss

data.chText: 指轻轻或漫不经心地扔、抛、掷：
data.enText: to throw sth lightly or carelessly

data.chText: 她把她的短上衣丢到床上。
data.enText: She tossed her jacket onto the bed.
hurl

data.chText: 指猛扔、猛投、猛摔：
data.enText: to throw sth violently in a particular direction

data.chText: 暴徒把一块砖猛地扔向汽车，砸破了挡风玻璃。
data.enText: Rioters hurled a brick through the car's windscreen.
fling

data.chText: 尤指生气地或急匆匆地用力扔、掷、抛、丢：
data.enText: to throw sb/sth somewhere with a lot of force, especially because you are angry or in a hurry

data.chText: 她把信摔在桌子上。
data.enText: She flung the letter down onto the table.
chuck

data.chText: 指随便扔、抛：
data.enText: ( especially BrE informal ) to throw sth carelessly

data.chText: 我把钥匙扔给了他。
data.enText: I chucked him the keys.
lob

data.chText: 指往空中高扔、高抛、高掷：
data.enText: ( informal ) to throw sth so that it goes high through the air

data.chText: 他们在朝墙那边扔石头。
data.enText: They were lobbing stones over the wall.
bowl

data.chText: （板球）指把球投给击球员
data.enText: (in cricket) to throw the ball to the batsman
pitch

data.chText: （棒球）指把球投给击球员
data.enText: (in baseball) to throw the ball to the batter
to throw/toss/hurl/fling/chuck/lob/bowl/pitch sth at/to sb/sth
to throw/toss/fling/chuck/lob sb sth
to throw/toss/hurl/fling/chuck sth aside/away
to throw/toss/hurl/fling/chuck/lob/bowl/pitch a ball
to throw/toss/hurl/fling/chuck/lob stones/a brick
to throw/toss/hurl/fling sth angrily
to throw/toss/fling/chuck sth casually/carelessly

means: 大声说出(辱骂或斥责等)

value.def: If you hurl something, you throw it violently and with a lot of force.

example.ex: Groups of angry youths hurled stones at police...
example.tran: 成群结伙愤怒的年轻人朝警察投掷石块。

example.ex: One prisoner set fire to rags and hurled them into the courtyard...
example.tran: 一名囚犯将破布点着，扔进院子。

example.ex: Simon caught the grenade and hurled it back...
example.tran: 西蒙接住手榴弹，又把它大力掷了回去。

example.ex: Gangs rioted last night, breaking storefront windows and hurling rocks and bottles.
example.tran: 几个帮派昨晚聚众闹事，他们打碎商店临街的玻璃窗，并投掷石块和瓶子。

value.def: If you hurl abuse or insults at someone, you shout insults at them aggressively.

example.ex: How would you handle being locked in the back of a cab while the driver hurled abuse at you?
example.tran: 如果你被锁在出租车后座上而且还遭到司机的无礼谩骂，你会怎么办？
